Commander, excuse me!\""},{"lineNumber":4588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統、満鉄王はポピンズの同盟相手です！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Commander, the Mantetsu King is Poppins' ally!"},{"lineNumber":4589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　罰を与えるとしても、慎重に……」","translatedEnglishLine":" Even if we must punish him, we should be cautious...\""},{"lineNumber":4590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がっっははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":4591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それはいい！　……ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":" That's good! ...Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":4592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、これは美人の参謀殿。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, a beautiful strategist."},{"lineNumber":4593,"originalJapaneseLine":"　身体が夜泣きでもされたかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":" Has your body been waking in the night or something?\""},{"lineNumber":4594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、これはいったい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what on earth is this...\""},{"lineNumber":4595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、俺がいきなりブチ殺すとでも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What, did you think I would just suddenly kill you?"},{"lineNumber":4596,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思ってたのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":" You really thought that?\""},{"lineNumber":4597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、まあ……軽はずみな事が無かったのでしたら","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, yes... if you didn't do anything rash,"},{"lineNumber":4598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よかったです、が……」","translatedEnglishLine":" then that's good, but...\""},{"lineNumber":4599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「話してみたら、このハゲ親父にも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After talking, I realized even this bald old man"},{"lineNumber":4600,"originalJapaneseLine":"　情状酌量の余地があると分かってな」","translatedEnglishLine":" has some room for mercy.\""},{"lineNumber":4601,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えぇと……被害が減るなら、いいのですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... as long as the damage decreases, that's good...\""},{"lineNumber":4602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫。もう総統殿の姿を使うのは止める。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's alright. I will stop impersonating the Commander-in-Chief."},{"lineNumber":4603,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ざっくり壊れてしもうたしのう」","translatedEnglishLine":" It's pretty much broken anyway.\""},{"lineNumber":4604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺は度量のある男だからな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm a man with a generous spirit!"},{"lineNumber":4605,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がっはっは！」","translatedEnglishLine":" Gahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":4606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふぉっほほほほほ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fohohohohoho!\""},{"lineNumber":4607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh...\""},{"lineNumber":4608,"originalJapaneseLine":"後日――――","translatedEnglishLine":"Some days later――――"},{"lineNumber":4609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああもう！　総統を捕まえて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez! Catch the Commander!\""},{"lineNumber":4610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、だめ……！　か、壁を登って逃げて……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No...! He's climbing the wall to escape...!\""},{"lineNumber":4611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がぁっははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":4612,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふぉっほほほほほ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fohohohohoho!\""},{"lineNumber":4613,"originalJapaneseLine":"ポピンズの発明を駆使して","translatedEnglishLine":"Using Poppins' inventions skillfully,"},{"lineNumber":4614,"originalJapaneseLine":"覗きや夜這いを行うランスの対応に、","translatedEnglishLine":"the women had renewed difficulty dealing with Lance's peeping and night visits."},{"lineNumber":4615,"originalJapaneseLine":"女性陣は改めて苦慮することになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The women once again struggled with the situation."},{"lineNumber":4616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「のう、人類王。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Human King,"},{"lineNumber":4617,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっと思ったんじゃが」","translatedEnglishLine":" I was just thinking,"},{"lineNumber":4618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだ、変態爺」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What is it, perverted old man?\""},{"lineNumber":4619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂、その……魔剣カオス？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That... I was wondering about the magic sword Chaos?"},{"lineNumber":4620,"originalJapaneseLine":"　使えたりせんじゃろか」","translatedEnglishLine":" Could I maybe use it?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外な機敏性を見せて、
ハリボテのようなランスもどきが走る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A fake Lance, like a papier-mâché figure, runs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい柚美、撃て！！」
「っ、だめ、アレ、あの仕掛け、
たぶんポピンズの……！」
「ちぃっ……！　どりゃーーーッ！」
「わっひょーぅ」
ランスがカオスを投擲する。
「うげっ！
って、おおぅお、しまったーー！」
直撃して剥がれた上半身の奥から――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From deep inside the upper body that was peeled off by the direct hit—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満鉄王が出てきた瞬間、柚美に撃ち抜かれていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The moment the Mantetsu King appeared, he was shot through by Yuzumi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ったく……俺のフリして覗きだと？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly... pretending to be me to peep, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このハゲが……覚悟はできてるんだろうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bald guy... you're prepared for this, aren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっそり同じ事してたッスよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were secretly doing the same, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ尋問の時間だ！　じゃあなーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now it's time for interrogation! See you later---!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは満鉄を掴んで、そそくさと消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance grabbed Mantetsu and quickly disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「満鉄王……あの人が……そうでしたか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Mantetsu King... that person... so it was him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、今頃閣下にどつかれてると思うッスけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I think he's probably getting thrashed by the lord by now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ウルザさん？」
「短気を起こしてないと良いけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hope he hasn't lost his temper..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここね……総統、失礼します！」
「総統、満鉄王はポピンズの同盟相手です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Commander, the Mantetsu King is Poppins' ally!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 罰を与えるとしても、慎重に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we must punish him, we should be cautious..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がっっははははははは！
それはいい！　……ん？」
「おお、これは美人の参謀殿。
身体が夜泣きでもされたかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Has your body been waking in the night or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、これはいったい……」
「なんだ、俺がいきなりブチ殺すとでも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, did you think I would just suddenly kill you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思ってたのか？」
「ええ、まあ……軽はずみな事が無かったのでしたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, yes... if you didn't do anything rash,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よかったです、が……」
「話してみたら、このハゲ親父にも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After talking, I realized even this bald old man

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情状酌量の余地があると分かってな」
「えぇと……被害が減るなら、いいのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... as long as the damage decreases, that's good..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大丈夫。もう総統殿の姿を使うのは止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's alright. I will stop impersonating the Commander-in-Chief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざっくり壊れてしもうたしのう」
「俺は度量のある男だからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a man with a generous spirit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がっはっは！」
「ふぉっほほほほほ！」
「ああもう！　総統を捕まえて！」
「ッ、だめ……！　か、壁を登って逃げて……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No...! He's climbing the wall to escape...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がぁっははははは！」
「ふぉっほほほほほ！」
ポピンズの発明を駆使して
覗きや夜這いを行うランスの対応に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the women had renewed difficulty dealing with Lance's peeping and night visits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性陣は改めて苦慮することになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The women once again struggled with the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「のう、人類王。
ちょっと思ったんじゃが」
「……なんだ、変態爺」
「儂、その……魔剣カオス？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That... I was wondering about the magic sword Chaos?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使えたりせんじゃろか」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 情状酌量の余地があると分かってな」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざっくり壊れてしもうたしのう」
「俺は度量のある男だからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm a man with a generous spirit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がっはっは！」
「ふぉっほほほほほ！」
「ああもう！　総統を捕まえて！」
「ッ、だめ……！　か、壁を登って逃げて……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No...! He's climbing the wall to escape...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がぁっははははは！」
「ふぉっほほほほほ！」
ポピンズの発明を駆使して
覗きや夜這いを行うランスの対応に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the women had renewed difficulty dealing with Lance's peeping and night visits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性陣は改めて苦慮することになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The women once again struggled with the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「のう、人類王。
ちょっと思ったんじゃが」
「……なんだ、変態爺」
「儂、その……魔剣カオス？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That... I was wondering about the magic sword Chaos?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使えたりせんじゃろか」
